breast.transformationDescription: [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldSpider(surprisingly normal, humanoid)], [npc.nipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldSpider(normal milk)].
breast.crotchBoobsTransformationDescription: [npc.She] now [npc.has] [style.boldSpider(mammal-like)], [npc.crotchNipplesFullDescription], and when lactating, [npc.she] will produce [style.boldSpider(suspicious milk)].
